item.name: Tap Mac Spaces
item.appendix: Tap R-CTRL und R-ALT wird zu L-CTRL+L-ALT+L-CMD Cursor links und rechts.
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::CONTROL_R, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R, KeyCode::CONTROL_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
